header.title: qtip2 yoututbe previews 0.9.3 with bbcodes
header.description:
a mod that uses the jquery qtip 2 plugin to show a fast loading preview of a youtube video.
these bits of codes are pretty much copy and pastes of the http://craigsworks.com/projects/qtip2/demos/
while working and functional they primarily a proof of concept mod showing how easily qtip2 can be used in phpbb3 to expand it's core functionality.
